experiences.title: Software Development Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Yahoo!
workDescription: Developed a new feature Pipeline Templates for Yahoo's open-source platform, Screwdriver, a Kubernetes, and Docker-based CI/CD tool.

Streamlined and simplified CI/CD workflow creation for platform users through implementation of new feature which expedites development processes and ensures consistency across projects. This feature is currently being used in over 70+ distinct projects.
Utilized ReactJS and JavaScript for back-end and front-end development for template validation, publishing, and tagging, ensuring seamless communication between distributed components.
Conducted automated testing using Mocha and wrote testing scrips for all functions of the pipeline templates feature, ensuring adequate test coverage and improved feature performance.
Designed RESTful APIs for module integration and integrated Git for version control, ensuring code integrity and standardization.

experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Infosys
workDescription: Designed, implemented, and deployed a company-wide, end-to-end cloud-based platform (LEAP) for real-time enterprise application management using React and JavaScript, utilized by over 100+ global clients, demonstrating significant industry-wide impact.
Improved mobile device accessibility of the platform through Android Studio using Kotlin, leading to a 20% boost in user engagement by enabling convenient on-the-go decision-making capabilities.

Developed a prediction model using Linear Regression (in Python) for a sports company, driving a 20% rise in inventory turnover, a 15% reduction in stock-outs, leading to its adoption as a template for similar dashboards across multiple client accounts.

Integrated Jenkins with Mocha to generate testing reports to identify issues across multiple testing suits by automating test execution with a cognitive automation bot (ICAP CI/CD), resulting in 30% reduction in manual testing, and 20% increase in test coverage.
Built a large-scale web application for an online marketplace platform using ReactJS and JavaScript while integrating secure authentication and authorization mechanisms using JWT and OAuth 2.0.

Implemented Elasticsearch integration to include search functionality and payment gateways using SDKs, decreasing average search query response time by 50% and ~60% surge in online transactions compared to previous manual transaction process.

Built a recommendation engine using collaborative filtering algorithm (k-NN) in Python, driving personalized product suggestions based on user behavior, leading to 20% increase in conversion rates among users who interacted with recommended products.
Received a RISE Insta Award for significant contributions to the success of the LEAP platform's development, showcasing substantial dedication and expertise.
